article.description: McNeese State holds off Nicholls, wins 83-78 in OT
article.headline: McNeese State holds off Nicholls, wins 83-78 in OT
article.linkText: McNeese State holds off Nicholls, wins 83-78 in OT
article.story: LAKE CHARLES, La. -- Desharick Guidry had 20 points and Kevin Hardy added 14 with 11 rebounds as McNeese State fought off Nicholls for an 83-78 win in overtime on Saturday. Matthew Moss completed a three-point play with 2:25 left in the extra period to give McNeese a 77-75 lead and Lance Potier, who finished with 12 points and 11 rebounds, made a layup and three free throws to seal the win. McNeese State held a 39-29 lead at the break, but Nicholls charged back to take its first lead at the 9:38 mark. The Colonels led 70-68 with 28 seconds remaining in regulation and McNeese State's Jamaya Burr made two free throws to force overtime. Guidry was 6 of 11 from the floor and made 6 of 7 free throws. Burr chipped in 10 for McNeese State (12-15, 6-10 Southland Conference). Luka Kamber and Ja'Dante' Frye had 16 apiece for Nicholls (7-18, 4-11).

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
